description1: I'm currently a Senior React Fullstack Engineer • Contractor • Freelancer,
description2: , building tools for the web or mobile world. The main tools I work with are React, React Native and NodeJS. In 2022, I graduated from the Faculty of Automation and Computers at the Polytechnic University of Timisoara with a Bachelor's degree in Engineering. I am a fast learner who thrives in challenging environments and am committed to continuous growth. Known for my strong teamwork skills, I excel at collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and deliver high-quality results.
projectDescription1: Expense tracker app with AI functionality which turns photos taken on tax receipts in app expenses.(developed with an OCR API) More than that , you can see your expenses based on the selected month, day and export this data as pdf. You have charts that describe how much you spend in comparison to the last month. A screen with an exchange rate of several currencies and another screen with your profile. This app was developed in React Native and Real Time DB Firebase.
projectDescription2: Pizza restaurant app. A website developed with React, NextJS and mongoDB.
